name: Vana (Breda University of Applied Sciences, Ugro)
name_original: Vana (Breda University of Applied Sciences, Ugro)
description:
Play as a mysterious magic character, helping souls to pass on the afterlife by collecting scattered pieces of their soul.  Explore an oneiric limbo world and face challenges to complete you mission and unravel the secrets and mourning of the lost souls.

📝 Designers 📝

Radu Nenu

Rico Visscher

Luca Yavuzok

Matteo Ugrote

Sebastiaan van der Kruijs

Melina Martinez Tabares

Katelin Van Lissum

Sven Leitsch

Nathalie Stuit

Renee Rozemeijer

Mika Goddrie

Vassil Mihaylov

💻 Programmers 💻

Cas Trines

Tom van het Ende

Nicolo Conte

🕹 Controls 🕹

W, A, S, D for movement

Space bar to jump, space bar to jump again

Right click to grab or pull a cube, left click to throw or push it!

Hold space bar to glide (when available)
